StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetBusinessPercentageRSS]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID integer, @MonthBeginDate date.me, @Interviews decimal(6,1), @NewRSS bit AS
DECLARE @NumRSSs INT
--- if there are no interviews for the organiza.on return 0s for the business percentage values IF @Interviews = 0 SELECT 0 AS BP_TC, 0 AS BP_OC, 0 AS BP_AC, 0 AS BP_HV ELSE /* if the RSS has been open at least 3 months (@NewRSS = 0) then get its business percentage data convert the sum for each interview type to a decimal so we can round it up a.er dividing by the number of interviews */ IF @NewRSS = 0 BEGIN SELECT ISNULL( CONVERT (DECIMAL, SUM(RA.TC_INTERVIEWS))/@Interviews, 0) AS BP_TC, ISNULL( CONVERT (DECIMAL, SUM(RA.OT_INTERVIEWS))/@Interviews, 0) AS BP_OC, ISNULL( CONVERT (DECIMAL, SUM(RA.AC_INTERVIEWS))/@Interviews, 0) AS BP_AC, ISNULL( CONVERT (DECIMAL, SUM(RA.HV_INTERVIEWS))/@Interviews, 0) AS BP_HV FROM RSS_ACTIVITY RA WHERE RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @MonthBeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @MonthBeginDate) END ELSE /* if the RSS has been open less than 3 months (@NewRSS = 1) then get the average business percentage data for all the RSSs under the parent RS. convert the sum for each interview type to a decimal so we can round it up a.er dividing by the number of interviews */ BEGIN
SET @NumRSSs = (SELECT COUNT(RO.ORGANIZATION_ID) FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = (SELECT OM2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP OM2 WHERE OM2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID) AND RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RSS' AND RO.ISOPEN = 'Y')
IF @NumRSSs > 0 BEGIN SELECT ISNULL( (CONVERT (DECIMAL, SUM(RA.TC_INTERVIEWS))/@Interviews)/@NumRSSs, 0) AS BP_TC, ISNULL( (CONVERT (DECIMAL, SUM(RA.OT_INTERVIEWS))/@Interviews)/@NumRSSs, 0) AS BP_OC, ISNULL( (CONVERT (DECIMAL, SUM(RA.AC_INTERVIEWS))/@Interviews)/@NumRSSs, 0) AS BP_AC, ISNULL( (CONVERT (DECIMAL, SUM(RA.HV_INTERVIEWS))/@Interviews)/@NumRSSs, 0) AS BP_HV FROM RSS_ACTIVITY RA INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = (SELECT OM2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP OM2 WHERE OM2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID) AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @MonthBeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @MonthBeginDate) END ELSE
BEGIN SELECT 0 AS BP_TC, 0 AS BP_OC, 0 AS BP_AC, 0 AS BP_HV END END
/* OLD WAY
ALTER PROCEDURE sp_GetBusinessPercentageRSS @Organiza.onID integer, @MonthBeginDate date.me, @Interviews decimal(6,1), @NewRSS bit AS
IF @Interviews = 0 SELECT 0 AS BP_TC, 0 AS BP_OC, 0 AS BP_AC, 0 AS BP_HV ELSE
SELECT SUM(TC_INTERVIEWS)/@Interviews AS BP_TC, SUM(OT_INTERVIEWS)/@Interviews AS BP_OC, SUM(AC_INTERVIEWS)/@Interviews AS BP_AC, SUM(HV_INTERVIEWS)/@Interviews AS BP_HV
FROM RSS_ACTIVITY WHERE RSS_ACTIVITY.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID AND RSS_ACTIVITY.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @MonthBeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @MonthBeginDate) */
